messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a horde of rodents have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Burning Father's Stopover LXXIII. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Office.
